quotes.text: Shower once every two days in order not to strip your body of its natural oils.
Eat half a grapefruit for breakfast.
Your gut controls your body and mood.
Eat yoghurt and other antibiotics regularly.
Take Evening Primrose Oil for healthier skin.
Coconut oil is comedogenic - don’t use it on your face unless you want break outs!
Use activated charcoal when brushing your teeth for a whiter appearance.
Don’t sleep with wet hair or you’ll get a cold!
Drink passion flower tea to sleep better.
Detoxify your body by exercising moderately for at least 20 minutes.
Hot water opens your pores, and cold water closes them.
Exercise for at least 30 minutes a day.
Magnesium helps relax your muscles.
Use a sheet mask daily for hydrated skin.
Don’t use screens at least an hour before bedtime.
Early to bed, early to rise makes you healthy, wealthy and wise!
People who stay up late are more likely to be depressed.
Drink hot water!
The placement of your pimples is dictated by your gut and hormones.
If you’re tired, eat spinach!
Eating garlic will help your head cold.
Flotation therapy calms us down because we all want to return to the womb state.
If it tastes bad, it must be good for you!
If you’re having trouble sleeping, take a nice, warm bath.
Your yin/yang sign should dictate your diet.
If you have low body temperature, buy a Fujitsu Heat Pump.
Clearing your inbox steadies your heart rate.
Ground up pessimism is a nice way to flavour tomato-based soups.
5+ a day keeps the doctor away!
Alcohol is antibacterial - drink enough vodka and you’ll stop getting the flu.
If you’re lovesick, try inhaling your object of affection’s worst photo.
If you want a slimmer nose, use thin tampons.
Always use toner.
Sunshine makes you happier.
Soy milk has high levels of estrogen and will cause you nightmares and breakouts.
Drink almond milk if you’re assimilating into the middle class.
Hit yourself to circulate the rage in your blood.
Eating barley will pacify your mother about night time teeth grinding.
Red dates contain iron that helps women get speedy recovery from menstruation.
Cut an onion and leave it in your room for clearer sinuses.
Moisturise in upward motions in order to satisfy the patriarchy.
Drinking mineral water will raise your overall wealth profile.
Ingest one teaspoon of fish oil every day in order to eventually breathe underwater.
Wearing the colour blue everyday will lower your stress levels.
Yoga will help your therapist relax.
Putting lead and mercury on your face is very retro, but it might cause you to die.
White beauty standards will eventually kill you.
Don’t smoke if you’re an opera singer!
Chew slowly to lose weight
Eat smaller meals regularly rather than eating one pot pasta alone in your bedroom.
Earning money will raise your self esteem more than working hard.
Sprinkle activated charcoal on your keyboard to detoxify your DM’s
Grown men who drink breast milk are statistically more likely to vote right wing.
Add a shot of coconut oil to your pre-workout smoothie to enhance both brain function and muscle performance.
Buy a gym subscription to burn both disposable income and calories.
Drink magnetized water to reduce pain and achieve a sense of equilibrium
Buddhists reportedly listen to Carly Rae Jepsen prior to long sessions of meditation.
Prolonged exposure to bad ASMR youtube videos will cause higher levels of cortisol to be released in the body.
A sedentary lifestyle is the perfect exercise for boys with high metabolisms.
Eat spicy pungent food, to alleviate grief.
Having low blood pressure makes you more attractive to princes.
